name: Silver Legacy Junior Suite – 2 Queen
description: The Silver Legacy Junior Suite with 2 Queen beds offers spacious comfort in the heart of downtown Reno. Enjoy modern amenities, a comfortable sitting area, and stylish décor with panoramic city and mountain views from the towering Silver Legacy — perfect for golf groups sharing rooms.
shortDescription: Spacious Silver Legacy Junior Suite with 2 Queen beds and downtown Reno skyline views.

faqs.question: Is the Junior Suite good for golf groups?
faqs.answer: Yes — two queen beds and a sitting area make it ideal for golf groups sharing rooms in downtown Reno.

faqs.question: What views does the Junior Suite have?
faqs.answer: Panoramic city and mountain views from Silver Legacy's towering position above downtown Reno.

testimonials.quote: Junior Suite at Silver Legacy was great for two guys. Two queens, sitting area, great views. GTHS got us a solid golf package rate.
testimonials.author: Mike D.

testimonials.quote: Good value for a suite in downtown Reno. Views from the tower are impressive and the beds are comfortable after a long day of golf.
testimonials.author: Kevin T.
